reviews.review_text:
Love this place‚Ä¶Delicious food with a view. We came across this fantastic restaurant which has an amazing river view. The place is compact, small and cozy but Saanvi who runs this place along with her family has a very big heart. She is the main cook behind the amazing Fish Thalis and all the Goan style authentic dishes.

This place also serves superb starters like Chicken Crispy, lollipop.

We tried and recommend
Chonak Fish Thali - 290/-
Prawns rawa fry - 300/-
Reshado Bangdo - 140/-
Chicken crispy - 200/-

You can relax, chill and take the balcony seat, enjoy the view and mouth watering dishes.

Special mention to Saavi‚Äôs Bangdyache or mackerel hooman/curry. Loved the way it was prepared, very authentic and exactly how a mackerel curry should be with Tefla, ginger, garlic pieces.

I am in love with this place. It was my last day in goa and definitely I ended it on a lovely noteü•∫ü§©.

First of all the location of the place is beautiful. You get a nice view of Mandovi River while having your food, do try visiting over day time to enjoy the river view.

Secondly the food, oh my god it is super yum and the pricing is super affordable.

Things I ordered.
Butter garlic Squid
Prawns masala fry
Fish thali.

Squid was yum, the sauce in which it was prepared was üòã. One should definitely try it.

The prawns fry were to die for, the size of the prawns were huge and the taste was too good.

Lastly we had the fish thali. All the items on the fish thali were packed with taste and freshness.

The staff of Aapas were super friendly, warm and surely goa felt like home.

A highly recommended place. Please visit this place when in Panjim.‚ù§Ô∏è
I found this place very Vibing. with good music, good view & good food. Try lepo rawa fry & chicken rawa fry.
